ViewObject.Name: PrmOpportunityView
ViewObject.SQLQuery: SELECT PrmOpportunity.ID, PrmOpportunity.CONTENT_OWNER_ID, PrmOpportunity.OPPORTUNITY_NO, TraxContentOwner.CONTENT_OWNER_NO ACCOUNT_NUMBER, TraxContentOwner.NAME ACCOUNT_NAME, TraxContentOwner.NAME ACCOUNT_NAME_2, TraxContentOwner.SITE ACCOUNT_SITE, TraxAddress.COUNTRY, TraxContentOwner.KEY_ACCOUNT_LEVEL, PrmOpportunity.NAME, JhsUsers.DISPLAY_NAME AS Alliance_Manager, PrmOpportunity.DESCRIPTION, PrmOpportunity.OPPORTUNITY_TYPE, PrmOpportunity.CURRENT_STATUS, PrmOpportunity.REASON_LOST, (select count(distinct TraxTitleCat.ID) from TRAX_TITLE TraxTitleCat inner join prm_targeted_product_title tptcat inner join prm_opportunity_target potcat on tptcat.id = potcat.PRM_TARGETED_PRODUCT_TITLE_ID on TraxTitleCat.id = tptcat.TITLE_ID where potcat.PRM_OPPORTUNITY_ID = PrmOpportunity.ID and TraxTitleCat.catalog_number is not null) AS CATALOGUED_COUNT, (select count(distinct TraxTitleNoCat.ID) from TRAX_TITLE TraxTitleNoCat inner join prm_targeted_product_title tptnocat inner join prm_opportunity_target potnocat on tptnocat.id = potnocat.PRM_TARGETED_PRODUCT_TITLE_ID on TraxTitleNoCat.id = tptnocat.TITLE_ID where potnocat.PRM_OPPORTUNITY_ID = PrmOpportunity.ID and TraxTitleNoCat.catalog_number is null) AS UNCATALOGUED_COUNT, PrmOpportunity.CURRENT_PRE_STATUS, PrmOpportunity.CURRENT_CATALOGING_STATUS, PrmOpportunity.CURRENT_AGREEMENT_STATUS, PrmOpportunity.agreement_received_date as agreement_logInDate, PrmOpportunity.PROBABILITY_PCT, PrmOpportunity.PRIORITY, PrmOpportunity.EXPECTED_PIPELINES, PrmOpportunity.ESTIMATED_CLOSE_QUARTER, PrmOpportunity.AGREEMENT_RECEIVED_DATE, PrmOpportunity.EXCLUSIVITY_SOUGHT_OBTAINED, PrmOpportunity.DOCUMENT_SIGNED, PrmOpportunity.SUMMON_DEEP_INDEXING_FLAG, PrmOpportunity.SUMMARY, PrmOpportunityAgreementData.FORM, PrmOpportunityAgreementData.TYPE, TraxContract.TECHNICAL_CONTACT_ID, (concat(TraxContact.FIRST_NAME, concat(' ', TraxContact.LAST_NAME))) || CHR(13) || ContactCellPhone.CONTACT_DETAIL_1 || CHR(13) || ContactWorkPhone.CONTACT_DETAIL_1 || CHR(13) || ContactEmail.CONTACT_DETAIL_1 AS TECHNICAL_CONTACT, PrmOpportunity.AUTO_RENEWAL, PrmOpportunity.CREATED_BY, PrmOpportunity.CREATED_DATE, trunc(PrmOpportunity.CREATED_DATE) as created_by_search, PrmOpportunity.LAST_UPDATED_BY, PrmOpportunity.LAST_UPDATED_DATE, trunc(PrmOpportunity.LAST_UPDATED_DATE) as last_updated_by_search, LookupCode.LOOKUP_CODE_SET_ID, PrmOpportunity.CURRENT_STATUS CURRENT_STATUS1, PrmOpportunity.OPPORTUNITY_TYPE OPPORTUNITY_TYPE1, PrmOpportunity.AUTO_ADD_TARGETS_FLAG, PrmOpportunity.OPEN_ACCESS_FLAG, PrmOpportunity.NAME NAME1, PrmOpportunity.OPPORTUNITY_NO OPPORTUNITY_NO1, TraxContract.ID CONTRACT_ID, TraxContract.CONTRACT_NUMBER, PrmOpportunity.DOC_TYPE FROM PRM_OPPORTUNITY PrmOpportunity INNER JOIN TRAX_CONTENT_OWNER TraxContentOwner LEFT OUTER JOIN TRAX_ADDRESS TraxAddress ON TraxContentOwner.ID = TraxAddress.CONTENT_OWNER_ID AND TraxAddress.PRIMARY_FLAG = 'Y' ON PrmOpportunity.CONTENT_OWNER_ID = TraxContentOwner.ID LEFT OUTER JOIN PRM_OPPORTUNITY_ALLIANCE_MGR PrmOpportunityAllianceMgr INNER JOIN PRM_ALLIANCE_MANAGER PrmAllianceManager INNER JOIN JHS_USERS JhsUsers ON PrmAllianceManager.JHS_USERS_ID = JhsUsers.ID ON PrmOpportunityAllianceMgr.PRM_ALLIANCE_MANAGER_ID = PrmAllianceManager.ID AND PrmAllianceManager.USER_TYPE in ('AM', 'AST') ON PrmOpportunity.ID = PrmOpportunityAllianceMgr.PRM_OPPORTUNITY_ID AND PrmOpportunityAllianceMgr.END_DATE IS NULL LEFT OUTER JOIN PRM_OPPORTUNITY_AGREEMENT_DATA PrmOpportunityAgreementData ON PrmOpportunityAgreementData.PRM_OPPORTUNITY_ID = PrmOpportunity.ID INNER JOIN TRAX_LOOKUP_CODE LookupCode ON PrmOpportunity.OPPORTUNITY_TYPE = LookupCode.INTERNAL_VALUE AND LookupCode.LOOKUP_CODE_SET_ID IN (210, 273) LEFT OUTER JOIN PRM_OPPORTUNITY_CONTRACT PrmOpportunityContract LEFT OUTER JOIN TRAX_CONTRACT TraxContract LEFT OUTER JOIN TRAX_CONTACT TraxContact LEFT OUTER JOIN TRAX_CONTACT_METHOD ContactWorkPhone ON TraxContact.ID = ContactWorkPhone.CONTACT_ID AND ContactWorkPhone.CONTACT_METHOD = 'Phone' and ContactWorkPhone.CONTACT_METHOD_SUB_TYPE = 'Work Phone' AND ContactWorkPhone.PRIMARY_FLAG = 'Y' LEFT OUTER JOIN TRAX_CONTACT_METHOD ContactCellPhone ON TraxContact.ID = ContactCellPhone.CONTACT_ID AND ContactCellPhone.CONTACT_METHOD = 'Phone' and CONTACTCELLPHONE.CONTACT_METHOD_SUB_TYPE = 'Cell Phone' AND ContactCellPhone.PRIMARY_FLAG = 'Y' LEFT OUTER JOIN TRAX_CONTACT_METHOD ContactEmail ON TraxContact.ID = ContactEmail.CONTACT_ID AND ContactEmail.CONTACT_METHOD = 'Email' AND ContactEmail.PRIMARY_FLAG = 'Y' ON TraxContract.TECHNICAL_CONTACT_ID = TraxContact.ID ON PrmOpportunityContract.CONTRACT_ID = TraxContract.ID AND TraxContract.active_flag = 'Y' ON PrmOpportunity.ID = PrmOpportunityContract.PRM_OPPORTUNITY_ID
